column2: The Trinity
This person is, or is descended from emanations of the entire trinity.
The Trinity
This person is, or is descended from an emanation of the Son.
The Trinity
This person is, or is descended from an emanation of the Father.
The Trinity
This person is, or is descended from an emanation of the Holy Spirit.
Found an Emanation of the Son
Found an Emanation of the Father
Found an Emanation of the Spirit
Claim to be the next emanation of the Son
The Alawite faith believes that god exists as a trinity which is emanated across history as various reincarnations of each aspect. Could I be the next emanation of the Son?
Claim to be the next emanation of the Father
The Alawite faith believes that god exists as a trinity which is emanated across history as various reincarnations of each aspect. Could I be the next emanation of the Father?
Claim to be the next emanation of the Holy Spirit
The Alawite faith believes that god exists as a trinity which is emanated across history as various reincarnations of each aspect. Could I be the next emanation of the Holy Spirit?
Merge the bloodlines of the Trinity.
As I hold bloodlines of all three aspects of the Trinity, I truly am an Icon of the Trinity.
The ritual begins and you partake in several mind expanding herbs to bring you in closer contact with the greater whole of the Son. Is your essence a fragment of it's own?
I cannot sense its essence, I will continue my attempt.
Yes I share in its essence.
Yes I share in its essence.
Yes I share in its essence.
You awaken from the trance after several days have passed, you have suffered no ill effects from the ritual and thus must be an emanation of the Son.
I am the Son

You awaken from the trance after several days have passed,  you have been told that you were temporarily incapacitated due to vomiting, though you remember none of this. You have failed in your attempt.
I have failed!
